trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D" /> that is a composite of the transforms in its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D" /> que é uma composição das transformações em sua <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this class when you want to apply multiple general transforms to single object.
trans-unit.target: Use esta classe quando você deseja aplicar várias transformações gerais em objeto único.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.%23ctor%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" /> objects that form this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" /> que constitui esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" /> objects that form this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" /> objetos que constituem esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.Children%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.ChildrenProperty> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem for <see langword="true." />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (eles podem não ser resolvidos) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.Clone%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências a recursos, vinculações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas seus valores atuais são.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem for <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.CloneCurrentValue%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets the inverse transform of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />, if it has an inverse.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a transformação inversa deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />, se houver um inverso.

trans-unit.source: The inverse transform of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />, if it has an inverse; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A transformação inversa deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup" />, se houver um inverso; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The inverse of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup> is created by combining the inverses of its child transforms.
trans-unit.target: O inverso de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup> é criado, combinando o inverso de uma das transformações seu filho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.Inverse%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The 3-D bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: A caixa delimitadora 3D a ser transformada.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box to the smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains all the points in the original bounding box.
trans-unit.target: Transforma a caixa delimitadora 3D especificada na menor caixa delimitadora 3D alinhada por eixo possível que contenha todos os pontos na caixa delimitadora original.

trans-unit.source: The transformed bounding box.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.TransformBounds%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming <c>inPoint</c>.
Attempts to transform the specified 3-D point.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="inPoint" /> was transformed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="inPoint" /> foi transformado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.TryTransform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
